title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 400.8 - Exception, construction standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 400.8 - Exception, construction standards

State Regulations

The standards set forth in this Subchapter, to the extent
they constitute construction standards, shall not apply. Medical facilities
shall comply with the construction standards contained in Article 2 of

Subchapter C of this Chapter (State Hospital Code). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
400.8

Amended

New

York State Register November 13, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 46, eff. 11/13/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
